code: import React from'react';import"./Card.css";import AddPortfolio from'../Portfolio/AddPortfolio/AddPortfolio';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card"});const Card=_ref=>{let{id,searchResult,onPortfolioCreate}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"company logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[searchResult.name," (",searchResult.symbol,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",searchResult.currency]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"info",children:[searchResult.exchangeShortName,"- ",searchResult.stockExchange]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddPortfolio,{onPortfolioCreate:onPortfolioCreate,symbol:searchResult.symbol})]});};export default Card;
